actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the rapid depreciation of expenditures of rehabilitated low-income rental housing incurred after December 31, 1974.

summary.text: Allows, under the Internal Revenue Code, the rapid depreciation of expenditures to rehabilitate low-income rental housing incurred after December 31, 1974.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the rapid depreciation of expenditures of rehabilitated low-income rental housing incurred after December 31, 1974.
